channel.title: Ivana Jordan on djvelimir.github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Ivana Jordan on djvelimir.github.io

item.title: Corner of your eyes
item.description: I’m like a river when you are the sea over and over waiting for me I faint my desire, my walk through the fire relying to me all on my own Will you give me back the love I want to give you Something that will guide me through the life Most of the faces in all different places In a little corner of your eyes I’m like a dreamer when you are my dream
